name: Ext_R5_ConceptMap_gr_el_ta_valueSet
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ConceptMap.group.element.target.valueSet for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents ConceptMap.group.element.target.valueSet from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ConceptMap|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Identifies the set of target concepts
element.definition: The set of concepts from the ConceptMap.group.target code system which are all being mapped to as part of this mapping rule. The effect of using this data element is the same as having multiple ConceptMap.group.element.target elements with one for each concept in the ConceptMap.group.element.target.valueSet value set.
element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.element.target.valueSet` has no related element in R4B:ConceptMap

element.short: Identifies the set of target concepts

element.comment: `ConceptMap.group.element.target.valueSet` has no related element in R4B:ConceptMap
